fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture and media, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Sport, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Costituzione startup e intercettazione delle facilitazioni finanziarie messe a disposizione dagli Organismi Europei per l'accesso alle misure agevolative europee.
goals__remit: Società di consulenza aziendale  indipendente internazionale. Ricerca, consiglia e presenta opportunità di sviluppo in Italia e all'estero delle imprese clienti attraverso una attività di consulenza globale.
